response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it could have on your operations, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $9,500. This price reflects not only the product's worth but also our commitment to helping you achieve success with the right tools. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
